jwkaltz@apache.org
text:
The URL in hitlist now contains the relative link to the documents twice, so it
does not work.
To reproduce:
 - run crawler and indexer on default publication
 - search for word "tutorial" 
 - links in result list look like:
 http://.../lenya/default/live/lenya/default/live/tutorial.html

Proposed fix: if, in the file lenya/xslt/search/search-and-results.xsl, at line
171, I remove all selects before "uri", the links are fine. The variable "uri"
seems to contain the complete, correct link.

Additional note: may I recommend using concat() to concatenate elements, instead
 of simply writing them one after the other. For one, it is easier to read and
debug, and, more importantly, I have experienced a Servlet Engine which
introduces spaces sometimes in the links, when they are not fabricated with
concat() - in which case the links are broken.

I was not able to reproduce the problem for 1.2RC6 on Windows 2000 because of 
bug 29312.
